verse.gurmukhi: bygm kI qw sO ruic lwgI ]

verse.gurmukhi: jw qy nINd BUK sB BwgI ]

verse.gurmukhi: dyiK geI jb qy iqh Dwmw ]

verse.gurmukhi: qb qy AOr suhwq n bwmw ]4]

verse.gurmukhi: hmY swh suq ju qY imlY hY ]
